import React, {useState} from 'react' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import PropTypes from "prop-types" import { create_studentuser } from '../../actions/auth' import { Redirect } from 'react-router-dom' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Row, Col } from 'react-grid'; const StudentSignup = ({create_studentuser, isAuthenticated,isStudent}) => { const [student, setStudent]=useState({ username:'', email:'', password:'', password2:'' }) const handleChange=(e)=>setStudent({ ...student, [e.target.name]:e.target.value }) const {username, email, password, password2}=student const handleSubmit=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); const newStudent={ username, email, password, password2 } console.log(newStudent) create_studentuser(newStudent) } if(isAuthenticated && isStudent){ return } return (

    handleSubmit(e)}>
    handleChange(e)} />

    ) } StudentSignup.propTypes={ create_studentuser:PropTypes.func.isRequired, isAuthenticated:PropTypes.bool, isStudent:PropTypes.bool } const mapStateToProps= state =>({ isAuthenticated:state.auth.isAuthenticated, isStudent:state.auth.isStudent, }) export default connect(mapStateToProps, {create_studentuser})(StudentSignup)
